title: Bit Buddy
description: BitBuddy is a cryptocurrency platform built with Flask that allows users to buy, sell, and stake cryptocurrencies, as well as providing access to real-time market data through blockchain and external APIs.

title: Loyalty Point Checkout System
description: Welcome to the Loyalty Point Checkout System! This project is a Ruby-based system for managing customer checkouts and rewards. The system prompts users for their information, processes their checkouts, and calculates rewards based on their purchases.

title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: Markov Text generator
description: Welcome to the Markov Text Generator! This project uses a Markov chain to generate random text based on an input file or URL.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Positive News Site
description: A website that gets data from a news API and uses sentiment analysis to publish only positive news.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: Energy Consumption Calculator
description: This Rust program allows users to calculate the energy consumption and cost of running any device or appliance based on their input for power consumption, running time, and cost per kWh.

title: Download Cleaner
description: A script that monitors the Downloads folder and deletes old files keeping the folder clean.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that checks a music band's website and sends an email when there are new tours.

title: Distance Converter
description: A program that will take take km's and convert them to miles and vice versa you can save the history of calcuations as well. It is a GUI tkinter app.

title: Helper Chatbot
description: A chatbot that knows about a specific topic and answers questions regarding that topic.

title: Open Domain Chatbot
description: A chatbot built that can discuss anything with a human and is built using the Facebook API.

title: Statistical Calculator API
description: Welcome to the Statistical Calculator API! This project is a simple yet powerful RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js. It provides endpoints to calculate the mean, median, and mode of a list of numbers.

title: Real-time Cryptocurrency Price Dashboard
description: Welcome to the Real-time Cryptocurrency Price Dashboard! This Streamlit app allows users to track the latest prices and 24-hour changes of various cryptocurrencies. The app provides an intuitive and visually appealing interface for monitoring real-time cryptocurrency data

title: Adventurers Guild Registration System
description: Welcome to the Adventurers Guild Registration System! This project is a OOP focused Java application for registering adventurers, setting their ranks, and class specifications.

title: Webcam Motion Detector
description: A program that monitors the computer webcam and sends an email when a new object enters the view.

title: Typing Analyzer
description: A program that monitors the computer keyboard and returns the most typed words of the session.

title: Internet Speed Analysis
description: A program that records the internet speed every few seconds and plots the values on the browser.

title: Monitoring Data
description: A program that monitors a particular website and periodically records the data to a remote server.

title: Visualizing Data
description: A program that visualizes the data collected in the previous monitoring program.

title: Visualizing Weather Forecast
description: A data web app that visualizes the weather forecast for the next five days of any city.

title: Student Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing university student data with an SQL database backend.

title: School Management System
description: A desktop PyQt6 GUI app for managing complex university data with an SQL database backend.

title: Restaurant Menu Web App
description: A Django web app to let customers see a restaurant menu and meal availability.

title: Online Store
description: A Django online store app where users can place orders and sellers can manage them.

title: QR code Generator JS
description: This project is a simple QR code generator that takes a URL input from the user and generates a QR code image file (qr_img.png) and a text file (URL.txt) containing the URL.
